objectives: Students will analyze and evaluate different perspectives on biography and achievement
Students will articulate complex ideas with supporting arguments
Students will demonstrate spontaneous interaction with minimal hesitation
Students will use advanced discourse markers to structure their speech
can_do_statements: Understand main ideas of complex text on concrete and abstract topics
Interact with degree of fluency and spontaneity with native speakers

warm_up.description: Students brainstorm ideas related to biography and achievement and categorize them
instructions: Write the topic on the board
Students call out related words and concepts

main_activities.title: Debate: Biography and Achievement
procedure: Introduce the activity and model if necessary
Divide students into pairs or small groups
Monitor and provide support as needed

main_activities.title: Case study analysis: Biography and Achievement
procedure: Introduce the activity and model if necessary
Divide students into pairs or small groups
Monitor and provide support as needed

main_activities.title: Presentation and Q&A: Biography and Achievement
procedure: Introduce the activity and model if necessary
Divide students into pairs or small groups
Monitor and provide support as needed

discussion_questions: To what extent do you agree that biography and achievement is important?
What are the main challenges associated with biography and achievement?
How might biography and achievement evolve in the next decade?
What factors influence people's attitudes toward biography and achievement?
In what ways does biography and achievement affect society?
What measures could be taken to improve biography and achievement?
How does biography and achievement differ across cultures?
What role does government play in biography and achievement?
What are the ethical implications of biography and achievement?
How can individuals contribute to biography and achievement?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Professional meeting about biography and achievement

practice_activities: Identifying weak forms in authentic speech
Rhythm and stress in longer utterances

extension_activities: Research current trends in biography and achievement and present findings
Write an argumentative essay about biography and achievement
Create a podcast episode discussing biography and achievement

homework.task: Write a 250-word opinion piece on biography and achievement
requirements: Present a clear argument with supporting evidence
Use discourse markers to structure your writing

assessment_criteria.fluency: Can express ideas smoothly with few pauses
assessment_criteria.accuracy: Shows good grammatical control with few errors
assessment_criteria.vocabulary: Has good range of vocabulary with some precision
assessment_criteria.pronunciation: Clear and natural with good control
assessment_criteria.interaction: Can engage actively and maintain discourse

teacher_notes.preparation: Review key vocabulary and concepts related to biography and achievement
anticipated_difficulties: Students may lack background knowledge on this topic
Students may need encouragement to speak at length
differentiation: Provide sentence starters for less confident students
Offer more complex discussion questions for advanced students
Allow use of dictionaries during preparation time
teacher_notes.cultural_considerations: Be aware of cultural sensitivities related to biography and achievement
teacher_notes.follow_up: Monitor student progress and provide individual feedback

methodology: Communicative Language Teaching (CLT) with Task-Based Learning
